Package com.mhealthatlas.mhealthatlasusers.command

Interface IMHealthAtlasUserCommandService

All Known Implementing Classes:
MHealthAtlasUserCommandService
public interface IMHealthAtlasUserCommandService
Contains handler methods for events created by the Keycloak and methods to mutate the stored user settings and queries.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void handleUserCreated​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode userData)
    Handels a "user_created" event.
    Therefor the event payload is mapped to an UserCreatedEventDto and transformed in a User entity.
    void handleUserDeleted​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode userData)
    Handels a "user_deleted" event.
    Therefor the event payload is mapped to an UserDeletedEventDto.
    java.lang.Boolean setUserQuery​(UserQueryDto userQuery, java.lang.Boolean isSubscriber)
    Saves a user query.
    java.lang.Boolean setUserSetting​(UserSettingDto userSetting)
    Stores a modified user setting.

  • Method Details

    • handleUserCreated

      void handleUserCreated​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode userData) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Handels a "user_created" event.
      Therefor the event payload is mapped to an UserCreatedEventDto and transformed in a User entity. Then the entity is saved to store the data changes in the database.
      Parameters:
      userData - the user data
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if the userData cannot be converted to a UserCreatedEventDto.

    • handleUserDeleted

      void handleUserDeleted​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode userData) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Handels a "user_deleted" event.
      Therefor the event payload is mapped to an UserDeletedEventDto. Then the user is deleted using the UserDeletedEventDto object.
      Parameters:
      userData - the user data
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if the userData cannot be converted to a UserDeletedEventDto.

    • setUserSetting

      java.lang.Boolean setUserSetting​(UserSettingDto userSetting)
      Stores a modified user setting.
      Parameters:
      userSetting - the modified user setting
      Returns:
      True, if the user setting was saved successfully;
      False otherwise;

    • setUserQuery

      java.lang.Boolean setUserQuery​(UserQueryDto userQuery, java.lang.Boolean isSubscriber)
      Saves a user query.

      If the user is not a subscriber then all other saved user queries are deleted before the new query is saved.

      Parameters:
      userQuery - the user query
      isSubscriber - the flag if the user is a subscriber
      Returns:
      True, if the user query was saved successfully;
      False otherwise;
